data.name: X-Plane 10 AddOn - Carenado - PA32R 301 Saratoga SP
data.detailed_description:
NOTE: THE MAIN GAME X-PLANE 10 IS NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORE! PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE DLCS WHEN YOU ARE ALREADY OWNER OF X-PLANE 10!


The Carenado line of aircraft has been well acclaimed by users and reviewers for many years and for good reason. They are well constructed, looks good and have impeccable behavior in flight. The cockpits are accurate and well equipped.

Features


  • Featuring four different paints schemes remembering the past four decades: yellow (seventies), beige with red (eighties), navy blue (nineties) and light blue with black (contemporary) plus a blank texture
  • Polygon optimized model
  • IFR certification
  • Default X-Plane 10 GNS430
  • Scroll wheel support
  • Internal dynamic reflections (Can be turned off)
  • Original Autopilot Altimatic IIIC (Century III) installed with an operation manual
  • Original Collins radios and instruments
  • Maximum details and realistic textures
  • Original HQ digital stereo sounds recorded from the original aircraft - Includes: Interactive virtual cockpit
  • Full moving parts: Ailerons, elevators, rudders, flaps, multi-stage rolling wheels, and trim tab
  • Animated sections such as: doors, locks, vents, sun visors with 3D motion, and vibrating antenna
  • Lights: Navigation lights, strobe lights, landing lights, 3D cabin lighting, reading lights
  • Transparent windows
  • 3D modeled pilot and cockpit area
  • Many details, such as: pitot, antennas, shocks, cowl plugs, baggage area
  • Custom VC panel and gauges with dynamically reflecting glass covers
  • Plug-in enhanced functionality and visuals
  • Prop disc animation with smooth 3-stage transitions
  • Realistic light effects on gauges
  • Nightlight effects on panel
  • Built-in zoom gauges
  • Toggle pop-up panel
  • Field of View knob
  • Toggle yoke at VC
  • Full checklist and reference text about the procedures
  • Accurate behavior compared to the real airplane
  • Accurate weight and balance
  • Documentation included: VC operation, Autopilot Normal & Emergency checklist and reference

data.short_description: The Carenado line of aircraft has been well acclaimed by users and reviewers for many years and for good reason. They are well constructed, looks good and have impeccable behavior in flight. The cockpits are accurate and well equipped.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 180 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
